actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
features = ['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare', 'Embarked']
X_train = train_df[features]
y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Fill missing values
X_train['Age'].fillna(X_train['Age'].mean(), inplace=True)
X_train['Embarked'].fillna(X_train['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)
test_df['Age'].fillna(test_df['Age'].mean(), inplace=True)
test_df['Fare'].fillna(test_df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
test_df['Embarked'].fillna(test_df['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

# Encode categorical variables
categorical_features = ['Sex', 'Embarked']
preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
    transformers=[
        ('num', StandardScaler(), X_train.select_dtypes(include=['int64', 'float64']).columns),
        ('cat', OneHotEncoder(handle_unknown='ignore'), categorical_features)
    ])

# Create pipeline
pipeline = Pipeline(steps=[('preprocessor', preprocessor), 
                          ('classifier', RandomForestClassifier())])

# Train model
pipeline.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Make predictions
X_test = test_df[features]
predictions = pipeline.predict(X_test)

# Save submission
submission = pd.DataFrame({'PassengerId': test_df['PassengerId'], 'Survived': predictions})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)
ENDOFFILE

import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
features = ['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare', 'Embarked']
X_train = train_df[features]
y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Fill missing values
X_train['Age'] = X_train['Age'].fillna(X_train['Age'].mean())
X_train['Embarked'] = X_train['Embarked'].fillna(X_train['Embarked'].mode()[0])
test_df['Age'] = test_df['Age'].fillna(test_df['Age'].mean())
test_df['Fare'] = test_df['Fare'].fillna(test_df['Fare'].median())
test_df['Embarked'] = test_df['Embarked'].fillna(test_df['Embarked'].mode()[0])

# Encode categorical variables
categorical_features = ['Sex', 'Embarked']
preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
    transformers=[
        ('num', StandardScaler(), X_train.select_dtypes(include=['int64', 'float64']).columns),
        ('cat', OneHotEncoder(handle_unknown='ignore'), categorical_features)
    ])

# Create pipeline
pipeline = Pipeline(steps=[('preprocessor', preprocessor), 
                          ('classifier', RandomForestClassifier())])

# Train model
pipeline.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Make predictions
X_test = test_df[features]
predictions = pipeline.predict(X_test)

# Save submission
submission = pd.DataFrame({'PassengerId': test_df['PassengerId'], 'Survived': predictions})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)

actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Preprocess data
features = ['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare', 'Embarked']
X_train = train_df[features]
y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Fill missing values
X_train.loc[:, 'Age'] = X_train['Age'].fillna(X_train['Age'].mean())
X_train.loc[:, 'Embarked'] = X_train['Embarked'].fillna(X_train['Embarked'].mode()[0])
test_df.loc[:, 'Age'] = test_df['Age'].fillna(test_df['Age'].mean())
test_df.loc[:, 'Fare'] = test_df['Fare'].fillna(test_df['Fare'].median())
test_df.loc[:, 'Embarked'] = test_df['Embarked'].fillna(test_df['Embarked'].mode()[0])

# Encode categorical variables
categorical_features = ['Sex', 'Embarked']
preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
    transformers=[
        ('num', StandardScaler(), X_train.select_dtypes(include=['int64', 'float64']).columns),
        ('cat', OneHotEncoder(handle_unknown='ignore'), categorical_features)
    ])

# Create pipeline
pipeline = Pipeline(steps=[('preprocessor', preprocessor), 
                          ('classifier', RandomForestClassifier())])

# Train model
pipeline.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Make predictions
X_test = test_df[features]
predictions = pipeline.predict(X_test)

# Save submission
submission = pd.DataFrame({'PassengerId': test_df['PassengerId'], 'Survived': predictions})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)
ENDOFFILE
